text: Gumazir maba, Godɨn angazangarimɨn aven ikegha, akurvazir aghuir Godɨn Nguibamɨn izezim inigha ghaze, a bar dera, egha igharaz darazi ko, Godɨn Duam inis. Egha Godɨn akam baregha fo, a bar dera. Me Godɨn gavgavimɨn aven ghua deragha an gani, gavgavir kam, a gɨn izamim dughiamɨn mɨseveghɨrɨgh azenimɨn otogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazim akɨrim ragh God gasaragh tuavir manatamɨn izɨ ua navim giragham? Bar puvatɨ. A kamaghɨn amua, mati, a uan navir averiamɨn aven Godɨn Otarim uam a isa ter ighuvim gafugha, a gurazɨ gumaziba ua dɨbovir akabar a mɨgei. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazir uan nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba ataghizir kaba, me ua navibagh iraghamin tuaviba puvatɨ.
